reviewText: Great movie. Hard to find. But i found it.

If you collect classic movies on dvd or blue ray format, like going to half price books for classic novels, or even from kindle; or even to an antique mall, for that priceless lamp or table. That's this movie for your collection. I'm not going to give you much about the actual movie other than you won't regret adding it to your classical collection....even if it's in Spanish only....you'll under stand.

dissapointed, looks like a VHS tape, a bad quality film!!!
the story seems like a religious theme. I was hoping for a DVD not this kind of trash.

It shows that films can be made about monks & children without any of the current bad reports, the overview on the back of the DVD roughly translates to "In the search of money and the aid for their Mission, the three friars know Cotolay, a boy who with exepcional abilities who helps them in their crusade to spred the truth of the gospel." It is well acted made in 1966 & the transfer is ok.
